name: Snake Game (PlayWithAayan)
description:
An illogical game where you try to feed your snake untill it bumps into itself and die, well it's kind of fun :)

Collect as much blue apples as you can to grow your snake, unlocking a greater height of difficulties in moving.

Dont forget to eat daddies pink apple after eating every ten blue apples, its healthy for your bones obviously.

Features :-

  • Snake Speed Controller
  • Four Snake Shapes
  • Five Different Snake Colors

How To Play :-

  • Play with "W, A, S, D" Keys
  • Play with Arrow Keys
